document_data.name: The Pack
document_data.mainbody:
'''The Pack''' were a group of powerful [[fiend]]ish creatures who hunted [[tanar'ri]] in the [[Abyss]] and served as the deities of the [[leucrotta]].

The Pack were led by a great leucrotta named [[Toknana]]. Toknana led [[Hruba]] the [[Chimera]], [[Ylarria]] the [[red dragon]], [[Voal]] the [[hydra]], and numerous leucrotta [[petitioner]]s, who were allowed to join the pack as a reward for being dangerous and resourceful during their lives.

The Pack did not fear anything and hunted and attempted to kill anything they encountered.

Leucrotta worshiped the Pack as gods and strived to join their host in the [[afterlife]]. As a reward, The Pack sent prey to deserving mortal followers or their members to protect leucrotta that needed defending or in an effort to teach them new tricks in deceit.
